org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.resthandlers

Class RestExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.resthandlers.RestExceptionHandler

  • public class RestExceptionHandler
extends io.cdap.http.ExceptionHandler
    Handles all exceptions thrown by handlers during the processing of an HTTP request.
